phrases: I have been tall ever since I was young.
When we line up for morning assembly, I am always at the end.
But I happen to be named Koizumi.
Everyone needs to watch their health.
Especially the third-years, who will need to prepare for exams soon.
Be careful not to catch a cold.
The first-years should be careful, too...
My summon monsters have all been wiped out!
I will definitely find a boyfriend!
So you stayed up all night playing games, huh?
I might have been one in a past life.
Quite the joker, are not you?
Okay, since you think you are so funny,
You do not get a vacation.
You need to take summer classes.
Do not give me that huh.
Being tall has absolutely no advantages.
No matter what I do, I always draw attention to myself.
Are you making fun of me?
I heard you have been trying really hard on the basketball team.
My name... is Otani, you idiot!
I was being kind and helping you!
How can you turn around and call me an amazon?!
I could call you Kyoshinhei instead
Would you please stop calling me that!
The first time Nakano-sensei called us that was on the first day of school.
Does no one want to be class representative?
Hey, what about All Hanshin-Kyojin over there?
We will have Koizumi and Otani do it.
I am trying to get out!
You are the one who should move, midget.
These summer classes are such a pain.
Nobu-chan, you failed the midterm test so it cannot be helped.
Well, my darling is going to school for basketball practice anyway,
Ahh, if I only had a boyfriend, too.
No, at the very least, just someone I like.
Then I would be more motivated.
But you sure are weird, Chiharu-chan.
You actually signed up for this.
As expected from the top student of our grade.
You sure think differently from the rest of us.
Well, I did not want to feel left out.
Hey, I heard that during summer classes all the different classes are grouped together.
I wonder if there will be any nice guys there.
As long as I will not have to see that midget Otani, it will be heaven.
I do not really like guys that I do not know.
I was going to ask the same thing!
I forget that Otani is a dimwit.
You have no right to say that!
I am only here because I snored during the graduation ceremony!
That is nothing to be proud of!
At least I did not fail!
All Hanshin-Kyojin, will you perform your comedy routine over the summer, too?
I asked you to stop calling me that!
Um... sitting next to a guy.
This is the worst summer ever.
I wonder if there will be any nice guys there.
I have not taken attendance yet.
Hey, can I sit behind you?
If you sit behind Koizumi, you will not be able to see the board.
Sorry... I am a little tall.
Maybe this will be the best summer ever!
I got something to say to you.
Why do not you walk home with me?
Why should I hang out with you after school?
Because I have something important to say that I cannot say here.
You sure are easy to read!
It is written all over your face.
Are you going to blackmail me for cash?
I am a super good guy, you know.
It just happens that I intend to become friends with Suzuki.
I might be able to set you up.
You really are a decent guy after all, Otani.
You only just realized now, idiot?
And here I thought you were someone who bore a grudge against giraffes in his past life.
What is this thing about giraffes?
It is on me, so order whatever you want.
A jumbo burger, a fish burger, or a super value set meal?
So Chiharu-chan is your type, huh?
From a girl's point of view, I suppose she is kind of cute but...
Well, I guess short people like other short people, huh?
Actually, I have to tell you something unfortunate.
So what if she does not like guys?
I will cure her of that!
Well then, we are counting on you.
I will give it my best!
Then we are on the same team.
Sir, we do not allow shadow boxing in here!
Yea Nakao-chi and I are going.
It is going to be fun.
Um... a friend of mine will be coming, too.
A pool can make you that happy?
I have not been to the pool for a whole year!
This is really different from the school pool.
This is no time to be fooling around!
I was so happy, I lost sight of my goal.
Hey, let us go for a swim.
Could it be you did not really want to come?
If I did not, I would not have.
Suzuki-kun, are you attending summer classes because you failed the midterm?
I had a cold the day of the test, so I could not take it.
I need to find a topic!
But I have no idea what to say!
Let us play beach volleyball, the four of us!
You call standing around in the water and not doing anything fun?
But I do not know what to say!
That is just because you are trying to pretend to be nice a girl.
Just do what you normally do.
Say, where did Nakao-kun and Nobu-chan go?
The two of them went over there a while ago.
Suzuki-kun, let us go on that!
Tanaka-san, let us go on that!
I am scared of things like that.
He is been gone for a while now.
He went somewhere when I met up with everyone.
She left me all alone and ran off to play with someone else.
I was a bit thirsty, so I went to get some juice.
I got a warm drink for you, Tanaka-san.
Should I have gotten you a warm drink too?
You went on that a lot of times, huh?
It is not scary at all.
Well then, I will give it a try.
I can talk with him normally now.
Chiharu-chan does not seem to dislike guys anymore, either.
Chiharu-chan and Suzuki-kun's houses are in the same direction.
And Chiharu does not dislike guys anymore.
She and I were pretty lovey-dovey, too.
Yeah, you guys seemed to be getting along well.
You had a pretty good mood going on too, Koizuni.
This is all thanks to you, Otani.
Let us work hard again tomorrow, okay?
Let us reach for happiness together!
Suzuki-kun sure is a nice guy, huh?
Do not tell me you have fallen for him?!
I always thought that guys were brutish and scary.
He is not scary at all.
But I thought you were getting along well with Otani yesterday, Chiharu-chan.
He is really easy to talk to.
It is probably because he is short, so he does not seem like a guy at all.
If Otani had heard that, what would he
I am small, therefore I am Kotani.
Please tell the teacher that Kotani will be absent today.
I told you to call me Kotani, did not I?
Are you trying to comfort me?
Hey, I was just worried about you.
What is with that sarcastic attitude?
So what if you got called small?
You are a man, are not you?
I am small so I do not count as a guy
Big or small, as long as you have a *** you are a man, right?!
Girls should not say that word.
Have not you always been called small?
Acting like this just because a girl said it is pathetic!
If you get so depressed over stuff like this, no one will ever like you, dumbass!
That idiot's punch really woke me up.
I am not good at getting up early in summer.
Well, I do not get up early in the winter either.
Yesterday, Tanaka-san seemed scared of me.
Suzuki-kun sure is a nice guy.
Uh... she is just not comfortable around guys.
It is not your fault, Suzuki-kun.
It is probably because we are almost the same height,
So Tanaka-san does not hate me then.
D-Do not tell me... you like Chiharu-chan?!
N-No, what are you talking about?
That look totally gave it away.
You were smacking me just a minute ago.
What are you so depressed for?
Sorry, just forget about what I said before.
I normally pretend to not care,
I am not giving up on Chiharu-chan!
If you get so depressed over stuff like this, no one will ever like you!
Those were my grandpa's last words.
I am glad you are here, Koizumi.
If I would been alone, who knows where I would have to run off too and hide?
I am going to keep trying, too.
So much for my sexy yukata seduction plan.
It just does not look right on a tall woman like me.
Chiharu-chan and the others are not here yet?
Do you think that maybe they got lost?
I did not recognize you for a moment.
It does not suit me at all, right?
But you really went all out.
Oh, she is here, she is here.
I bumped into him on my way here.
To prevent her from getting bumped, he switched positions with her, huh?
It is clear, but it is clearly upsetting.
They are like a couple who have just started going out.
This feels like the ending of the comedy show.
Let us just leave them alone.
Let me give it a try!
I thought you got lost in the crowd.
Let us get some grilled cuttlefish.
We may always be fighting, but our personalities kind of suit each other.
And we both have height complexes, too.
Not long after that, Chiharu-chan and Suzuki-kun became a couple.
You and Chiharu-chan looked pretty good together.
But you and Suzuki-kun did not work out at all.
I can find a girlfriend quickly enough if I want to.
I would like to see that.
Let us see who can get someone faster!
What will I get if I win?
I will buy you whatever game you want.
But if I win, you will buy me a new pair of basketball shoes.
I am not going to lose!
